channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: "Most important case ever": Supreme Court to decide fate of Trump's tariffs
item.description: The Supreme Court will hear a case on Wednesday that will decide the fate of President Trump's signature economic policy, the tariffs he has leveraged...

item.title: Trump says he'll "be involved" in Netanyahu's corruption trial "to help him out"
item.description: President Trump told CBS' "60 Minutes" that he'll "be involved" in Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's corruption trial "to help him out a lit...

item.title: Anthropic's models show signs of introspection
item.description: Anthropic, a leading AI company , tells Axios that its most advanced systems are learning not just to reason like humans — but also to reflect on, and...

item.title: Dems outpace GOP ad spending for Tuesday's elections
item.description: Democrats are significantly outspending Republicans on advertising for high-profile elections Tuesday in Virginia, New Jersey and Pennsylvania, which ...

item.title: Trump energy secretary says no nuclear explosions for now
item.description: After the president called for resuming nuclear testing “immediately,” the official said the administration is planning only system tests.

item.title: Poll finds most Americans doubt Trump’s commitment to free speech, fair justice
item.description: The American people also don’t seem to know quite what to make of the criminal cases against two of Trump’s perceived opponents.

item.title: Trump and Mamdani, best of enemies, can’t stop talking about each other
item.description: The rivals see political benefit to the attacks, which could also define New York for the remainder of President Donald Trump’s term in office.

item.title: The imperial aesthetic at the heart of Donald Trump’s presidency
item.description: In addition to his accumulation of political power, Trump has embraced visual cues designed to project personal command and grandeur.

item.title: Can Democrats reverse Trump’s Latino gains? This county has clues.
item.description: Trump flipped Passaic County in New Jersey last year. Now Democrats hope to capitalize on backlash to his administration in Tuesday’s gubernatorial el...

item.title: Democrats' frustration with their party sees sharp increase, poll shows
item.description: Democrats are increasingly losing faith in their party and its leaders — far outpacing Republicans who have doubts about the GOP, according to Pew Res...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
